message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $110. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?

I understand that $110 is a good price for you, Bob, but I'm not willing to go that low. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $125. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love the product.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $115?

I understand that $115 is still a bit above your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll offer it to you for $122. It's the lowest I'm willing to go, but I think it's still a great deal.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $117?
